channel.title: Why does this site fail so much?
channel.description:
This section could possibly be in the running for the biggest fail in the whole internet. The whole fucking forum is full of 12 year olds attempting to discuss important issues in todays society. Half of the threads end in one of them having a fucking fit and having big nerd rage.
That's my idea, now, why do YOU think this site fails so much?

item.title: Why does this site fail so much?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“counterp4545, post:1, topic:210480”][quote author=swotrain link=topic=274818.msg2260521#msg2260521 date=1212625412]
only reason im here is because moparscape is down…
[/quote]

Ditto :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 04, 2008, 03:19:10 PM[/size][hr][quote author=jme link=topic=274818.msg2260589#msg2260589 date=1212630339]

At this point, the question is why doesn’t this site fail so much.

You people are all retards (most of you). I stay because you hate me and I love to see nerds go into unstoppable rages

What are YOUR reasons for staying

You sure love to call people nerds (in most of your posts). Which is actually quite funny considering you are posting on a runescape cheating forum, which makes you a nerd whether you want to lie about that or not. You wouldn’t even know about this place if you weren’t a nerd. That doesn’t mean you are some acne-filled 300 pound kid who doesn’t take showers, but you are still a nerd.

Try fuckin’ with “nerds” in real life. It’s a lot more fun then sitting on a forum all day, trolling people so that you can read their response.
[/quote]

I don’t live next to any of my friends. Besides there’s nothing much to do in my house except go on computer, watch tv, or read

Nerd.

I think I am excluded from being a nerd because I’m good at sports and actually have friends… IRL!!![/quote]
I’m good at sports, and have mates in real life, do I win a cookie? I also program in my spare time, does this make me a huge nerd? Not really, all it proves is that I am able to program, in this case; Java, were you can’t. One thing I am better than you at.

Read full topic

@Keasho wrote:

it took me about 30 minutes to read this whole entire board… the first page is alright, but as it goes on it gets worse and worse. It made me really laugh reading all the so called ‘kids’ argue over entirly stupid off task subjects, if you are 9 years old and act mature and dont bother me i could care less how old you are? But, then again there is always some one to pick a fight.

You people are all retards (most of you). I stay because you hate me and I love to see nerds go into unstoppable rages

What are YOUR reasons for staying[/quote]

[quote=“counterp4545, post:1, topic:210480”]I don’t live next to any of my friends. Besides there’s nothing much to do in my house except go on computer, watch tv, or read

Nerd.

I think I am excluded from being a nerd because I’m good at sports and actually have friends… IRL!!![/quote]I think you mean this…

[quote=“counterp4545, post:1, topic:210480”]I don’t have any friends. Besides there’s nothing much to do in my house except go on computer, watch tv, have my mom stick her cock up my ass or read PlayGirl

Nerd.

I think I am a nerd because I suck at sports and actually have friends… ON 4CHAN!!![/quote] ktnxbye

You wouldn’t even know about this place if you weren’t a nerd. That doesn’t mean you are some acne-filled 300 pound kid who doesn’t take showers, but you are still a nerd.

Try fuckin’ with “nerds” in real life. It’s a lot more fun then sitting on a forum all day, trolling people so that you can read their response.

[/quote]

type normally, dont just type like half a word…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 04, 2008, 09:33:24 AM[/size][hr][quote=“I C U, post:52, topic:208529”][quote author=swotrain link=topic=274818.msg2260389#msg2260389 date=1212608931]

I haven’t played RuneScape in over a year. And I do not argue with you, because your argument holds no water, you make no sense. Coming onto a RUNESCAPE cheating website, to talk about how bad RuneScape is, is retarded. You have no reasoning skills, and are a defective child. Which makes you retarded, so quit calling us the retards. You’re the ignorant piece of shit that won’t go the Hell away. We don’t fucking want you here, you’re a waste of space on the database.
[/quote]

Bwa,haha. Cain says most people here don’t play RuneScape anymore.[/quote]

You seriously need to go.

item.title: Why does this site fail so much?
item.dc:creator: @k00dr k00dr
item.description:
@k00dr wrote:

One reason for failure is Moparscape discrimination. At Moparscape, the kids who are at least a bit interested in programming get to work on something practical, which is private servers. I know it’s a mess, but it works (barely), and that’s what matters.
